description: A spicy, aromatic and creamy curry.
name: Sweet & Spicy Potato Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g sweet potato, peeled and cut into cubes
1 medium red capsicum, deseeded and cut into bite size pieces
1 medium white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large pan to a medium heat and fry the spice seeds for 2 minutes or until they start to crack.
Transfer the seeds to a pestle and mortar and crush, then return to the pan with the canola oil.
Add the sweet potato, pepper, onion and garlic and cook this all for 5 minutes while tossing.
Add the rest of the ingredients apart from the parsley and allow this to simmer for 30 minutes while stirring occasionally.
Remove from the heat and serve with the parsley as a garnish with some suggested serving of rice or naan breads.
